      public static final SubscriptionTarget UNKNOWN
      Unknown SubscriptionTarget type. Should never happen and would only possibly happen if the K7Bot implemented a new API type and had yet to implement channnel-support for it.

    • fromId

      @Nonnull public static SubscriptionTarget fromId(int id)
      Static accessor for retrieving a SubscriptionTarget based on its K7Bot id key.
      Parameters:
      id - The id key of the requested target type.
      Returns:
      The SubscriptionTarget that is referred to by the provided key. If the id key is unknown, UNKNOWN is returned.
